bibl.author: Walt Whitman
bibl.title: Walt Whitman to James Arnold, June 1876
bibl.orgName: Trent Collection of Whitmaniana, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University

body.p: the design I gave you?—You will receive 300 plates from engraving-printers in two or three days & I will send 950 circulars for end of book—I have them ready—send over any time at 3 oclock o'clock

The style of the books (10 copies) you sent to-day is satisfactory. Go on with the remainder (590) in the same style—you will have the sheets (650 copies) of Two Rivulets in two or three days. Have you got the back-title cut according to...The letter...on back does not take well...
